articles.name: This Is A Test!
articles.content: I commented out the first button as I think I might be redundant.  One thing I would like to point up that <a> is in-line element. So you might get more than one <a> in the same line (in your case "Action" and "Another action" will display in the same line) . I recommend that you use <ul> and <li> to wrap <a> in the drop down menu list.  Rgds Sia
